modules.description: This module represents matched ranges within a search string, providing access to their start and stop indices. It allows extracting the actual substring captured during pattern matching. Concrete use cases include parsing structured text formats and extracting specific tokens or values from strings.

This module provides operations to analyze and extract information from pattern matches in strings. It works with match objects that represent successful matches, allowing retrieval of matched ranges, matched strings, and associated captures. Concrete use cases include parsing structured text formats, extracting tokens from strings, and implementing custom pattern-based data extraction logic.

This module implements Lua-style pattern matching operations, working with strings and compiled patterns to perform searches, matches, and substitutions. It provides functions to find and extract matched ranges, apply replacement functions based on matches, and supports structured text parsing tasks such as log analysis, token extraction, and custom format processing. Key data types include compiled patterns and match objects that expose captured ranges and matched substrings.
